item.title: Memo for Miss Lloyd' (regarding some personal details of 'Petros Willems' and 'Willem') (a copy)
item.summary: Lloyd copies a memo from Mr A. Martin in which he has noted !nauxa and !khannumup's measurements, and other details of their personal information and history.
item.comments: 1) See also !khannumup (or Petros Willems): his personal history and !nauxa (or Willem) at the Museum, 24 September 1880, 2) This story is found in Book XVI-1
item.author: none

keyword.subkw: additional information about him from A. Martin
additional information about him from A. Martin
